channel.title: Shuyang's VCD7 Docs
channel.description: Shuyang's blog for VCD7: Interaction Design, built with <3 using Jekyll and served thru GitHub Pages.

item.title: First post!
item.description:
Iâ€™m super excited to take the VCD7: Interaction Design class! Last Wednesday (August 27) was our first class, and we did a quick experiment on how to mirror an iPad to the screens in the computer lab in West Lake Hall.

The mirroring controls are AWFUL!
